articles.title: Asia-Pacific stocks mixed as investors react to hot U.S. inflation report - CNBC
articles.description: A closely-watched U.S. inflation report released Thursday showed a faster-than-expected rise in prices and lifted the 10-year Treasury yield past 2%.

articles.title: Black death mortality not as widespread as believed - Phys.org
